for y in range(0,input()):
      x = raw_input().split()
      a = int(x[0])
      b = int(x[1])
      while a % 10 == 0:
            a = a/10
      while b % 10 == 0:
            b = b/10
      v = str(a)[::-1]
      w = str(b)[::-1]
      u = int(v) + int(w)
      
      while u % 10 == 0:
            u = u / 10
      print str(u)[::-1]
